responsibilities.description: Currently developing edge-based AI Agent creation framework using local LLMs and LangChain4J to enable customers automate anomaly detection and incident reporting.

Architected a unified credential management system integrating tools like Power BI, Tableau, ServiceNow, etc, eliminating 90% of manual logins across 100+ sources per site. Developed API-driven dashboard selection and configuration interfaces, enabling zero-touch visualizations with 24/7 uptime.
Engineered system observability (using DBus, Micrometer, Grafana, Prometheus) and dynamic alerting to users (via in-app notifications and emails), reducing mean time to detection by 80%.
Achieved $100,000 in annual savings by customizing and whitelabeling Grafana v7.5.15 source code, eliminating OEM licensing costs.

Integrated HashiCorp Vault to securely manage credentials and tokens for RTSP streams, VNC/RDP sessions, and BI tools. Automated secret injection into runtime environments, eliminating manual handling and reducing operational risk.

Designed and maintained resilient disaster recovery system, automating daily backups and on-demand restoration for PostgreSQL databases, Vault secrets, and gigabytes of media files achieving RTO of less than 5 minutes.

Delivered ultra-low-latency, high-resolution video playback across synchronized LED panels by integrating NVIDIA SLI Mosaic and Megapixel 8K routing. Achieved zero frame loss at scale with centralized orchestration.

Drove Agile delivery cycles through sprint planning, backlog refinement, and peer code reviews. Mentored junior developers via onboarding and technical guidance. Authored documentation adopted across teams as the internal standard.

Spearheaded the end-to-end technical migration of Murex Market Risk from v2.36 to MX.3 v3.41, leveraging Ant automation, shell scripting, and granular configuration control to ensure a zero-defect transition across SIT1 and SIT2 environments.

Engineered custom bash scripts and SQL procedures to optimize the EOD risk processing pipeline, enhancing stability and reducing runtime by 15%. Acted as the primary technical liaison with Front Office to resolve VaR model and scenario simulation discrepancies.
Developed and maintained Ant scripts for automated deployment and configuration management, ensuring consistency across environments.
Delivered the technical build of the Market Risk module in MX.3, automating report reconciliation using SQL scripts reducing manual QA by ~30% and accelerating go-live readiness.
Designed and deployed market and credit risk configurations in MX.3, including VaR scenario modeling and Limit Controller setups, streamlining risk visibility.
Authored market risk scenario generation and application technical build documents, enabling faster handoffs and shortening deployment cycles.
